audit.description: Audit logs for the cluster and related APIs

cluster.description: Configure and Manage the Venice cluster, manage nodes in the cluster, DSCs, Tenants etc.

monitoring.description: Configure and manage Event, Stats, Logging, Alerts, Mirror Sessions and other policies

network.description: Configure and Manage Networks and Services

rollout.description: Configure and manage rollout feature to upgrade/downgrade software for the cluster

search.description: Powerful search API to search configuration policies, events etc.

security.description: Configure and manage security features like Security Groups, Rules, Certificates etc.

staging.description: APIS to stage configuration and commit in transactions

telemetry_query.description: Query telemetry information for the cluster

tokenauth.description: Manage tokens to access nodes in the cluster

workload.description: Configure and manage Workloads, Endpoints etc.
